comments: I was in a summer course online so the workload was pretty heavy but it was interesting and manageable. Fair grader and gives chances for make-up.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  INSPIRATIONAL  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Professor Gerring was a great teacher. When she graded and commented on my assessments, I missed a few points. Just make sure you include every possible answer in the assessment. Then you won\'t potentially miss points. She gets back quickly, and there are no exams. I enjoyed her class a lot!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Professor Gerring\'s courses are well organized, clear-cut and interesting. I have taken 3 different Art History courses from her online and loved each of them. She keeps information current. The online course requires quite a bit of time, but once you get used to the schedule it goes smoothly. She is very fair at grading and gives great feedback.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: LOVED her class, she was one of the main reasons I became very interested in art history. Her class was extrememly interesting, and her teaching methods were very useful and effective. Totally recommend!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: I\'ve taken live and online classes with this professor and can only say that if you want a very thorough and intense understanding of art history, she is the one to take it from. She uses lots of information from current sources and has excellent reference materials. You will remember stuff from this class for the rest of your life!

comments: Very difficult class. I took it online, it was very time consuming. I was told that the in class instruction was a better choice because it wasn\'t that hard. I would recommend taking this in class, not online.
